page.title: 07Winchfield Area - Home Life
page.content: Apart from the large agricultural community within the block there are the 'commuters' & those who go out to work & purely sleep in their homes. There are the retired people, mothers or fathers at home with their child- ren, parents at home with children at school/work or who have left home & a few unemployed youngsters. Most inhabitants fall in the middle/upper class bracket - the standard of living is fairly high. Most households have a car (or 2) - a car is almost essential in this rural area. There are those who work hard to make ends meet & those who employ domestic servants, gardeners & chauffeurs! Many young- -sters have their own ponies, attend private schools or have nannies which is an indication of the life-style. They lead a good social life & are very fashion conscious.
